input.sentences: the two sisters hugged each other after a visit
this was one of their son 's
he was going to be a big brother

output.sentences: During their visit, the two sisters hugged.
One of them introduced her son to his aunt.
She told her sister that soon he would have a little brother.
The new nursery was almost complete and it was almost time for him to arrive.
Imagine how happy her sister was to find a new baby would be here soon.
